;Recently, "Internet short dramas" have become the focus of public opinion, "Hengdian turns into a vertical store" and "The boss's short drama harvests" Topics such as "Europe and America" ​​have been on the hot searches in turn. The former refers to the fact that Hengdian Film and Television Base is now dominated by the "vertical screen short drama" shooting team; the latter refers to the short drama application platform ReelShort, which has begun to conquer overseas markets and even topped the U.S. iOS entertainment list.

;

;On November 22, the "2023-2024 China Micro-Short Drama Market Research Report" released by iiMedia Consulting showed that China's online short drama market size will be 37.39 billion yuan in 2023, a year-on-year increase of 267.65%. A total of 481 new short dramas were released in the first half of 2023, exceeding the level for the whole of 2022. It is estimated that the size of China's short drama market will reach 100.68 billion yuan in 2027.

;

;The rise of short videos has not only reshaped the audio-visual habits of netizens, but also accommodated netizens’ search, shopping, entertainment, and social needs: from search engines to short video platforms, from TV series to Switching to short dramas, switching from playing online games to watching short videos, switching from e-commerce shopping to live streaming... "Short Video+" is profoundly affecting the ecology of the Internet industry.

;

;As a result, various major Internet platforms have derived new business models of "short video + advertising" and "short video + e-commerce", which have greatly subverted the traditional profit model: ByteDance recently announced the contraction of its gaming business, Short videos are fully embraced; the time spent watching short videos by netizens has exceeded the time spent on online games; traditional online writers are rushing into new tracks; major film and television bases have turned into "vertical screen versions"... These phenomena show that the short video era has created a new era of short videos. The rise of the drama has also profoundly changed the overall ecology of the upstream and downstream industrial chains.

;

;The "2023 China Online Audiovisual Development Research Report" shows that among the 1 billion short video users in 2022, about 50.4% of users have watched short dramas within 3 minutes. The size of the short drama market in 2023 will almost reach half of the national movie box office, creating many traffic miracles and myths of sudden wealth. For example, in September 2023, the traffic miracle of "Wushuang" exceeded 100 million in revenue in 8 days, which caused a sensation. , the myth of getting rich "completed in one week, released in one month, and achieving financial freedom" is also widely circulated.

;

;The success of short plays is rooted in human nature, which is a deep need that people cannot erase. Human nature naturally loves "refreshment", "hate" and "relief", seeks emotional catharsis, and longs for emotional compensation. While the audience scolded the stereotyped short drama, they still couldn't help but finish watching a short drama with dozens of episodes before going to bed and experiencing the excitement of "it turns out that success and love can come so quickly."

;

;Short plays can often satisfy people's certain "feelings" and "hit" the inherent pleasure mechanism of human nature. Themes such as "Grand grudges between wealthy families", "Marriage first, love later" and "The domineering president fell in love with me" are everlasting. Revenge, counterattack, the boss's sweet pet, a golden son-in-law, marrying into a wealthy family... Such plots are also repeated many times. Can't get tired of watching it. The protagonist of the short drama has either become an alternative Count of Monte Cristo, or a film and television version of "Long Aotian" or "Mary Sue", or it seems to be the product of pressing shortcut keys on a long and drawn-out urban emotional drama.

;

;Slightly different from the previous Internet ecology, the current industry supervision has become more and more synchronized, which is a new situation worthy of attention. The recent news that "Tik Tok, Kuaishou, and WeChat platforms are jointly cracking down on illegal short dramas" is also consistent with the fact that the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television has "already removed 25,000 short dramas from the shelves. The next step will be to launch a one-month special rectification work on online short dramas." ” echoed the announcement.

;

;It can be seen that the Internet industry has indeed been "leading the way for three to five years." Past success may not be maintained for a long time in the face of new trends. The rise of short dramas with the help of short videos fully illustrates this point. At the same time, the "reckless state" of the Internet industry's barbaric growth and turf racing has passed, and the advancement of technology and industry and the follow-up of regulatory regulations are increasingly showing a "same frequency" state. In compliance with regulatory requirements, the pursuit of high-quality and high-quality content will still be the main focus of the short drama market in the future.

;

;Overlooking Fook Sin Hall. Photographed by “Anonymous”

;

;Since I first saw Fook Sin Tong in 2017, I have never forgotten it. "No name for now" is his online name, and acquaintances call him "No name for now." Even if the discovery of a Yuan Dynasty wooden building in the south was enough for him to leave his name in the history of architecture, he decided not to leave his name for the time being.

;

;Walk around the mountains and rivers of Fujian for a while, just like visiting old friends, to look for the historical buildings hidden deep in the ancient villages and scattered along the ancient roads. His "discovery" of Fu Shan Tang was accidental, or it might be inevitable.

;

;Fushan Hall is located in Zhengwei Village, Dikou Town, Jianou City, Fujian Province. It is a group of vernacular temple buildings, which conforms to the usual orientation rules of Chinese architecture: "sitting Different from "north to south", Fushan Hall conforms to the mountainous terrain of Zhengwei Village and faces south as a whole. The main hall is dedicated to the Three Treasures, and the left and right side halls are dedicated to Guanyin and King Dongping. It is a blend of Buddhism, Taoism and folk beliefs that are common in village temples.

;

;The main hall faces a Qing Dynasty stage across the courtyard, and is integrated with the main hall through the corridor. Before the main hall was confirmed as a Yuan structure, the stage was the narrative center of the entire building complex. When people in the village talked about Fu Shan Tang, they would always talk about the story of the stage, but they were completely unaware of the main hall.

;

;The "discovery" of Fu Shan Tang was not to find the existence of this building, but to confirm its identity as being built in the Yuan Dynasty. This time is July 18, 2023. That day, Liu Yan witnessed a "highlight moment" that has yet to come.

;

;Liu Yanhe has traveled almost all over the landscapes of southern Zhejiang and northern Fujian for more than ten years. He studies woven wooden arcade bridges. An amazing bridge structure unique to the Fujian and Zhejiang mountains. The same interests led him to meet each other very early on, and they have been online friends for seven or eight years.

;

;Zhengweicun not only has Fushan Hall, but also has two covered bridges from the Qing Dynasty. In July 2023, Liu Yan took graduate students to survey and map in Zhengweicun Covered Bridge, I didn’t hear that they were in Fujian yet, so I drove here from Fuzhou, holding a newly purchased infrared camera in my hand.

;

;Hundreds of years of burning paper and smoke, the beams of the main hall of Fu Shan Tang have been smoked black by the incense of believers. The inscriptions written by the ancients on the beams It is impossible to find it and can only be roughly dated based on its style. Using an infrared camera, it is possible to see traces of writing beneath the smoke.

;

;;

;

;In October 2023, instead of standing on the ladder, use an extended pole to connect the shooting instrument to observe the details of the components on the beams of Fushan Hall. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;According to preliminary observations, the main structure of Fushantang Hall is relatively complete, with shuttle columns, column foundations, humps, and replacement wood etc. The obvious early features, such as the planar column network and frame beams, are quite similar to the main hall of Shunchang Baoshan Temple built in the 23rd year of Yuan Zhizheng (1363) with a stone imitation wood structure. Through rough dating of style, it is not possible to judge that the structure of Fushan Hall is no later than the early Ming Dynasty, and may even be in the Yuan Dynasty.

;

;On that day, Liu Yan was not taken into Fushan Hall for the time being. While Liu Yan was still looking at the entire courtyard with unfamiliar eyes, he had already gone straight to the point and raised his infrared camera to identify the ink characters on Zhengliang.

;

;At first, Liu Yan didn't know what he saw through the infrared camera, because his expression didn't change much. He just raised his head to take a picture, and then lowered his head to confirm... Suddenly, he stopped getting excited. He held his breath, got excited, calmed down again, quickly checked on his mobile phone, and cautiously confirmed again. He no longer suppressed the ecstasy in his heart: "Yuan Dynasty! The greatest!"

; < p style="text-align: left;">;The inscription on the main beam shown in the infrared camera clearly reads: "On the ninth day of the eighth month of Wushen, the first year of Wei Zhi's reign, Yiwei came to Fucheng... Congratulations for the reconstruction of the city..."

;

;On November 25, 2023, the UNESCO Representative Office in China and relevant government agencies of Fujian Province and Quanzhou City hosted the "East Asian Wood Structure Building Protection and "Utilizing International Academic Exchange Conference", at which Lou Jianlong, deputy director of Fujian Museum, gave a speech entitled "Early Architecture and Characteristics of Fujian". During his speech, Lou Jianlong mentioned Fu Shan Tang. This may be the first time that Fu Shan Tang has been officially recognized as a newly discovered Yuan Dynasty building and mentioned at an international conference.

;

;The existing main structure of Fushan Hall was founded in the first year of the Great Rebellion, that is, 1307. Before it, the earliest known Yuan Dynasty wooden structure in southeastern China was the Yanfu Temple in Wuyi, Zhejiang, built in 1317, the fourth year of Yanyou in the Yuan Dynasty. The newly confirmed Fushan Hall in Zhengwei Village has now become the earliest Yuan structure in the southeast.

;

;Cheng - the "hedge" of two time differences

;

;Zhengwei Village, where Fushan Hall is located, is located among the mountains in northern Fujian middle. The ancestor of the Zheng family who came to the village was Zheng Hao from the Song Dynasty. Zheng Fawang, secretary of the village branch, took out a photocopy of the "Genealogy of the Zheng Family" compiled during the Wanli Period of the Ming Dynasty, which recorded the story of the Zheng family's entry into Fujian and their reproduction in Jianzhou. The first ancestor of this Zheng family to migrate to Fujian was Zheng Shu during the Five Dynasties period. By Zheng Hao, it was already the eighth generation. According to the genealogy, Zheng Hao decided to move here after taking a fancy to the Feng Shui of Zhengwei Village.

;

;Walking around the village, even a person who doesn't understand Feng Shui can easily see that the terrain of this village is indeed a bit special. Surrounded by two mountains like an armchair, the village "sits" safely in the mountain col between the two armrests. The opening of the armchair faces north, and a small stream flows through the entrance of the village, blocking the village in the mountain col. Fu Shan Tang is located in the west of the village - at the foot of the west armrest of the "armchair".

;

;;

;

;Looking northeast from Fushan Hall, Zhengwei Village has a panoramic view. Under the setting sun, the rammed earth walls of folk houses in northern Fujian turn golden. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;Although the old people in the village do not understand architecture, they have passed down from generation to generation that Fushan Hall was built by a man named Zhang Fushan in the Song Dynasty. Before Zheng came to the village, the main families in the village were Zhang and Wei. I don’t think this legend is likely to be an attachment, but Fushan Hall was probably built in the Song Dynasty, because the inscription mentions “reconstruction”.

;

;In 2021, Zhou Miao met Fu Shan Tang for the first time. He stayed there for a long time, "it was really beyond imagination," he recalled his feelings at that time to the Southern Weekend reporter. He is a young teacher in the Department of Architecture of Zhejiang City University and is fond of ancient dwellings in northern Fujian and southern Zhejiang.

;

;Liang Sicheng, in "The History of Chinese Architecture in Pictures", described the three periods of existing ancient architecture in China from the perspective of the history of artistic styles. The architecture of the Tang Dynasty was "grand. "Jing" became "mellow" from the Song and Yuan Dynasties to the early Ming Dynasty, and "straight" during the Ming and Qing Dynasties. Zhou Miao's research focuses on the transformation of architecture in the Tang and Song Dynasties. When he saw Fushan Hall, his professional intuition told him that the combination of columns, beams, and brackets had a "Song style".

;

;In this era, to be able to find a metastructure in the humid south is a rare thing for any architectural scholar.

;

;In the field of ancient architecture, there is a saying that "Look to Shanxi in the north and Fujian in the south." The quantity, quality and density of preserved ancient buildings in these two provinces are far behind. more than other provinces. But Fujian is more unique than Shanxi. "Shanxi is close to the Central Plains and the capitals of past dynasties, and the overall evolution of architecture has been relatively synchronized with the Central Plains dynasties. Maybe some styles have changed in the Central Plains, and Shanxi will also change in about 50 years." But Fujian is different, especially in the mountainous areas of northern Fujian and southern Zhejiang. , the development of architecture lags behind. If we see a style from the Song Dynasty there, it may be as late as the early Ming Dynasty. "So when we see a house in Fujian with a fairly old style, we dare not make a judgment." Zhou Miao said.

;

;However, Jian'ou, located in the upper reaches of the Min River, is a mountainous area, but it was the first area in Fujian to be developed by Han immigrants. In 206 AD, the Sun Wu regime established Jian'an County, the first county-level administrative region in Fujian history, in today's Jianou. Until the Song Dynasty, Jianzhou, centered on Jianou, was the cultural center of Fujian. At that time, Jianban books were popular all over the world, and Zhu Xi's Neo-Confucianism was also nurtured here.

;

;Zhou Miao later realized that although the mountainous areas of northern Fujian further north were developed very late, the narrow valley area in the upper reaches of the Min River was not too late. Specific to the style of architecture, there may also be a "time difference" between the Jian'ou area and other northern Fujian areas. This time difference "hedges" the time difference between northern Fujian and the Central Plains.

;

;"Weird power confuses the gods," Liu Yan said, pointing to the intricately carved cat beams and dou bao on the beams of Fushan Hall. Based on this intuition, he also boldly speculated that Fushan Hall was built in the Yuan Dynasty. "It feels like it is earlier than the Ming Dynasty, but it is unlikely to be in the Song Dynasty. Because both the Song and Ming Dynasties tend to be orthodox and regular. Only the buildings of the Yuan Dynasty can have this kind of unconventional and unconventional style." Weird and weird approach."

;

;;

;

;The beams of Fushan Hall are carved with complicated and strange cat beams and fighting arms. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;I will not write my discovery into a public account article for the time being. After posting it, I refused all media interviews, " He feels that he has completed his historical mission," Liu Yan said. In October 2023, Liu Yan completed the surveying and mapping task of the covered bridge project. Before returning to his workplace, Kunming University of Science and Technology, he decided to go to Fushan Hall again to conduct the first surveying and mapping of it. "Do you want to come? Maybe you will come for the time being. We may be able to persuade him to accept an interview." He asked the Southern Weekend reporter. At the end of October, Southern Weekend reporters met Fu Shan Tang and its discoverer, and also watched Liu Yan's team conduct a brief survey and mapping of Fu Shan Tang. What impressed me deeply was not only the building itself, but also the people who were bound by Fuk Sen Tang.

;

;Living - "Growth" in the eyes of architectural archeology

;

;Witnessing the discovery of Fushantang with her own eyes made Liu Yan feel that there was a kind of destiny The fate is inside. He is currently writing a series of studies on buildings "sitting south and facing north". This architectural form that "conflicts" with the norm fascinates him. Fushantang appeared at this time.

;

;Liu Yan studied for a PhD in "Architectural Archeology" in Germany, and "fine surveying" is the core tool in this field. For a large building, complete architectural archeology may take several years, even decades.

;

;In Germany, where Liu Yan studied, precision surveying and mapping is a "basic plan" for carrying out cultural preservation work. "There are no levels of cultural preservation in Germany. As long as it is cultural preservation, it is necessary to do such a complete and in-depth survey and mapping." Liu Yan said.

;

;A scholar of architectural archeology may not be able to do a few cases of precise surveying and mapping in his lifetime. Liu Yan's German mentor spent thirty years of his energy on a church. For the country, “this set of things is too luxurious. There are only a handful of cases across the country that can achieve the depth of architectural archeology through precise surveying and mapping. In Fujian, even the Luoyuan and Chen Taiwei Palace built in the Song Dynasty may not have been built yet.” Do enough mapping to match his identity," Liu Yan said.

;

;Architectural archeology is an emerging discipline in China. Liu Yan vividly described archeology as digging down layer by layer, "and their strata are spread horizontally." Architectural archeology discussed the overlapping historical layers in above-ground buildings. For example, a Song Dynasty building was replaced in the Ming Dynasty. A certain component, a corridor was added in the Qing Dynasty... Just like archeology, there are also "strata" layer by layer.

;

;;

;

;The interior of the main hall of Fuxiantang. Photo courtesy/"No name for now"

;

;Zhou Miao described Fushan Hall as a "growing" building: "Obviously, it was expanded and expanded in different periods. Renovated." At the scene, Southern Weekend reporters were not given a detailed explanation of this development: there is an inscription from the Hongzhi Year of the Ming Dynasty under the purlin in the front of the main hall, an inscription from the Kangxi reign of the Qing Dynasty under the porch, and an inscription from the Jiaqing reign of the Qing Dynasty in the side hall. , the stage shows the style of the late Qing Dynasty. The main hall itself contains different components and structures from the Yuan, Ming and Qing dynasties, not to mention the rich "strata" overlapping of the entire building complex. "Using 'Yuan to Qing' to describe the age of Fushan Hall is more accurate and closer to the essence of architectural heritage." I don't think so yet.

;

;Liu Yan said that architectural archeology is "architectural detective science." Through comprehensive collection of on-site clues, architects can find subtle changes in buildings in the river of time, thereby inferring social and personnel changes in the past dynasties. This is what he wants to do to Fuxiantang.

;

;"What the early Architecture Society did was architectural archeology, but at that time the focus of scholars' work was still to find the earliest buildings, and to find Tang Gou structures. , Looking for Song Gou, I can’t wait to peel off all the historical coverage of the Ming and Qing Dynasties.” Liu Yan said. The main hall of Hualin Temple in Fuzhou is such a classic representative. "The original survey map did not even record the Qing Dynasty corridor. During the restoration and repair, the Qing Dynasty corridor was directly demolished."

;

;Today's architectural archeology is different from the pursuits of early scholars. On the one hand, it pursues more detailed surveying and mapping, and on the other hand, it pays more attention to the "life story" of a building - the completeness of a building. The life narrative of a city not only focuses on its "first construction" or "original" youthful and heroic appearance, but also understands its changes through the ages and its life state until its twilight years.

;

;To understand the "growth" of Fu Shan Tang, we must not only start with the building itself, but also the historical environment where the building is located is also a key factor. Before the road was opened, the only way to enter and exit Zhengwei Village was through an ancient post road across a mountain stream. The ancient post road was connected to covered bridges. There was a covered bridge, Xian'en Bridge, at the entrance of the village, and a covered bridge, Desheng Bridge, at the end of the village. The two covered bridges marked the entrance. The only access to the village.

;

;The ancient post road was paved with wide stone slabs. "The ancient road was so wide, it can be seen that the village itself had financial resources in ancient times." Liu Yan speculated. There are two more covered bridges next to the village. "Those who have the ability to build covered bridges must be because the village is located on an important passage. It may be an important trade route in ancient times. People must pass through here to have the motivation to build it." Such a large covered bridge." Zhou Miao said.

;

;What surprised Zhou Miao even more was the Ming Dynasty residences in Zhengwei Village. "It is already a great thing to have Ming Dynasty residences in a village, and Zhengwei Village There may be more than five or six Ming Dynasty residences, and there are also many exquisite Qing Dynasty residences, which shows that this village has been prosperous for a long time. Its population reproduction and wealth accumulation must far exceed that of other surrounding villages." The accumulation of wealth has made Fushantang Large-scale reconstruction was carried out in the Yuan Dynasty, and during the Ming and Qing Dynasties, there was the possibility of continuous growth, with side halls, corridors, and stages...

;

;;

;

;福There is a stone tablet next to the entrance of the charity hall, which is engraved with the "Yicang Stele" written in the 50th year of Qianlong's reign. It has a chronicle on the front and a name on the back. According to this monument, there was originally a Mingjiao temple not far from Zhengwei Village. After it was abandoned, the villagers reclaimed the land and set up a charity warehouse in Fushan Hall, which could not only support the village, but also invest in public affairs, just like the current charity foundation. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;The main industry in Zhengwei Village is timber. The towering ancient trees in the surrounding mountains are the village's greatest wealth. In ancient times, villagers cut down trees and put the wood into the river. Following the water flow, they arrived in Fuzhou. Until the reform and opening up, the village had always been an important part of the timber industry chain in northeastern Fujian. "We still have land in Fuzhou, and we were relatively wealthy at that time." Zheng Fawang said that his ancestors were also engaged in the timber business. His ancestral house was built in the late Qing Dynasty and is located in the middle of Zhengwei Village. It is also a tall building. A mansion with deep walls.

;

;By combining clan power with industry, the Zheng clan controls large areas of surrounding mountains and forests. Now several surrounding villages are also dominated by the Zheng surname. In ancient times, it was the 'sphere of influence' of Zhengwei Village." said Zheng Jinlan, a staff member of the Dikou Town Cultural Station. Her hometown is in a village not far from Zhengwei Village, and her family's Zheng surname is derived from Zhengwei Village.

;

;Bad - As long as there are people’s activities, the buildings will be changed

;

;Walking in the alleys of the village, there were once tall ancient houses on both sides , many of which are only ruins. Not long after the Bailu solar term passed, a red paper notice for "Bailu Tomb Sweeping" was posted on the notice board in the village. It read "Guimao Year, Bawu Cemetery" - Bawu Gong was Zheng Hao.

;

;Different from the general Qingming tomb sweeping, Zhengwei Village arranges ancestor worship and sweeping in the Bailu solar term every year. This custom is said to have lasted for hundreds of years. According to the villagers, during the white dew, the water comes out and the water steps in the stream are easier to walk, so it was decided to visit the tomb at this time.

;

;Fushantang plays the role of the faith center in the small regional community centered on Zhengwei Village. When women in the village reach the age of 60, they will go to Fushan Hall to hold a grand ceremony, wearing special cyan clothes and bright red flowers on their heads, "just like primary school students registering at school when they are old." Zheng Fawang said that the local People call them Qingyi Zhaipo. The Tsing Yi Zhaipo's daily chanting place is Fu Shan Tang.

;

;;

;

;There is a close relationship between Qingyi Zhaipo. They come to Fushan Hall to chant sutras and hold rituals on fixed days, and they also agree to visit Fushan Hall once a month. General cleaning. The picture shows them at Fu Shan Tang in 2023. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;During the few days of interviewing in Zhengwei Village, I met Tsing Yi Zhaipo women in Fushan Hall every day. They chanted sutras, burned incense and chatted. Joking and basking in the sun, the laughter often drowned out the sound of chanting sutras. Obviously, the religious space has become a public space. During the days of chanting, they temporarily leave their families and spend some time with their sisters without worrying about trivial matters. Fu Shan Tang is a small sanctuary for the Tsing Yi vegetarians.

;

;Guanyin's birthday on February 19th, Buddha's birthday on April 8th, Amitabha's birthday on November 17th... On these solemn days, the Qingyi Zhaipo They will perform rituals at Fu Shan Tang. The busiest days of the year for Fu Shan Tang are from the 13th to the 15th day of the first lunar month.

;

;Every year on the twelfth day of the first lunar month, people from Zhengwei Village drive more than 80 kilometers to the Linshui Palace in Gutian County next door. Please come to the Water Queen, come A tour around the village. The Linshui Empress' name is Chen Jinggu, which is a popular folk belief in the mountainous areas of southern Zhejiang and northern Fujian. There is Lin Mo Niang on the seaside, Chen Jinggu in the mountains, and Gutian Linshui Palace is her ancestral temple.

;

;At four or five o'clock in the morning on the 13th day of the first lunar month, the people who invited the gods set off from the Gutian Ancestral Temple and returned. The trucks carried the statues of the gods, and a group of cars followed them. Drive back to Zhengwei Village. In the first month of 2023, Zheng Fawang followed the team on a trip to Gutian. It took more than an hour on the highway and was a difficult mountain road in ancient times.

;

;Please return to Linshui Empress, walk across the covered bridge at the entrance of the village, and first settle in a small temple at the entrance of the village. The architectural history of this temple is more than 200 years old. There are inscriptions from the Jiaqing period of the Qing Dynasty written on the temple beams. In the afternoon of that day, the villagers carried the statue of the god and walked around the whole village. Along the way, believers worshiped and made vows. Finally, it was carried to the main hall of Fushantang on the left side of the village. Facing the stage of Fushantang, everyone placed the statue properly.

;

;On the 14th and 15th days, there are lively activities to watch theaters and reward gods. The play is for the gods, and of course the mountain people from all over the country can also take advantage of it. The village troupe performed hard, the villagers prayed for God's blessings, firecrackers and red candles filled the sky, and the activities of wandering gods in the first month reached a climax.

;

;It is rare that a village in the mountains has its own theater troupe. The Zheng Long Theater Troupe in Zheng Weicun has a history of more than 200 years. On the wooden wall behind the stage, there is an inscription of the troupe's performance in the seventh year of Guangxu's reign. If Zheng Fawang's grandfather is still alive, he would be over a hundred years old. Zheng Fawang remembers that his grandfather played the erhu in a troupe before.

;

;;

;

;The stage of the Qing Dynasty directly opposite the main hall of Fu Shan Tang, every year on the 14th and 15th day of the first lunar month, the Zhenglong Troupe performs here to reward the gods. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;Zheng Weicun’s theater troupe is well-known in the surrounding area. The neighboring Nanya Town just invited them to perform there last month. Today there are still 20 to 30 people in the troupe, and the actors and musicians are all elders and aunties in the village. "Now there are no young people joining, and there is no fixed income." Zheng Fawang told Southern Weekend reporters.

;

;Zhou Miao studied ancient architecture in Shanxi in his early years. He found that many temples in Shanxi, especially the older ones, had been controlled by the cultural relics department, and their incense was gradually cut off. Local residents have become increasingly alienated from it. "Architecture here is still very closely related to people's lives. Traditional sacrificial rituals, belief spaces, and belief habits can still be bound to this settlement and this building."

;

;In 1951, Zheng Weicun Primary School was founded in Fuxiantang, with dozens of students. In 1960, Fu Shan Tang was turned into a public canteen. Different from the village temples in Shanxi, after the reform and opening up, the policy was relaxed, and Fushan Hall quickly became the center of religious activities in Zhengwei Village again.

;

;However, religious activities and the protection of ancient buildings seem to be an intractable contradiction. After the Fushan Hall was discovered, the leaders of the Provincial Cultural Relics Bureau repeatedly asked Zheng Fawang about the issue of open flames in Fushan Hall. Zhou Miao remembers that on New Year's Eve in 2019, Buyue Bridge, an ancient covered bridge in Jianou City, caught fire, "because there were too many people burning incense on the bridge that day."

;

;As long as there are human activities, the building will be changed. Sometimes, this change is slow, like the slow growth of Fuxiantang, and human activities wash away gently like waves. But some drastic changes have been common in recent years. In early November 2023, it was not discovered that the Yu family ancestral hall built in the twelfth year of Hongzhi (1499) in the Ming Dynasty in Lu Village, Gutian County, Fujian Province had been completely demolished by the villagers. The new ancestral hall being rebuilt "looks like a nondescript, nondescript A monster that is not a horse but a donkey." It is human nature for villagers to want to rebuild their ancestral temple when they have money, but they do not think this is a mismatch between cultural level and economic level. "Such an out-of-print ancestral temple with a clear date of more than 500 years , until it was demolished by the villagers, it was neither a cultural relic nor a historical building, and had no protection status at all." Let’s not talk about it for now.

;

;;Empty - what to keep;

;

;Before the founding of New China, Zhengwei Village was an armed village with its own village. At most, the village was armed with more than a hundred guns, making it look like a sizable army. To this day, there are still signs on the streets of the village that read, "It is forbidden by law to keep guns privately."

;

;;

;

;Slogans posted on the streets of Zhengweicun in October 2023. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;Neither Zheng Fawang nor the elders in the village could explain the reason, and various documents did not clearly record why a mountain village had such a Massive armament. Many people speculate that Zhengwei Village controlled the nearby mountains and forests at that time, and the Zheng family was a powerful local clan. In troubled times, the clan members used arms to defend themselves.

;

;In the spring of 1936, the Communist Party of China established a 50-kilometer northeastern Fujian province centered on Dikou Town in Jianou, including Jianou, Songxi, Zhenghe, and Gutian. Guerrilla base area. The villagers' armed forces soon integrated with the Northeastern Fujian guerrillas and became a reliable backup for the guerrillas. Since the villagers of Zhengwei Village are very familiar with firearms, the Zheng Family Ancestral Hall located in the center of the village naturally became a firearms repair shop for the guerrillas. The five-pointed star above the main entrance of the ancestral hall is the symbol of the Northeast Fujian guerrilla gun repair shop at that time.

;

;;

;

;Above the main entrance of the Zheng Family Ancestral Hall in Zhengwei Village. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;Fu Shan Tang has also witnessed this period of red history. On May 13, 1948, Zeng Jingbing, Secretary of the CPC Fujian, Zhejiang, and Jiangxi Provincial Committee, and more than 200 guerrillas watched Gan Opera with local villagers in Fushan Hall. Later, Fu Shan Tang became a general cultural relic site.

;

;In 1982, villagers partially repaired the main hall of Fu Shan Tang. According to temporary observation, the materials used at that time were crude and small, "far from the original structure." Maybe the conditions are too limited. In 2017, Zhengwei Village received protection funds from the "Traditional Chinese Village". The main hall and porch of Fushantang were partially repaired. The components that did not meet the specifications in 1982 were replaced and the roof was renovated. Now inside the temple, the light-colored wood was replaced in 2017, and the difference from the dark old wood is clearly distinguishable. It was this careful renovation that allowed many of the calligraphy inscriptions in Fu Shan Tang to be remembered until six years later, when I would visit again without carrying an infrared camera...

;

;Compared with the Yu Family Ancestral Hall, the Fu Shan Tang Hall is lucky. It has enjoyed hundreds of years of incense, and because of the special status of the attached building and stage, it has escaped the vicissitudes of the 20th century until a group of right people discovered it.

;

;;

;

;Looking down from the hill behind Fu Shan Tang, the Fu Shan Tang building complex is hidden among green bamboos. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;According to unavailable statistics, among the well-documented early wooden buildings newly discovered in Fujian Province in recent years, in addition to those that have been Among the demolished Yu family ancestral halls are Baofengyan in Anxi (Yongle period of Ming Dynasty), Longjian Palace in Zhangping (1482), Zhuo family ancestral hall in Youxi (Chenghua period of Ming Dynasty), and Hongnong Hall of Datian (Chenghua to Hongzhi years of Ming Dynasty). ), Yongtai Fairyland (1513)...most of them do not have any protected status. "They have a very accurate and complete sorting of historical buildings." Liu Yan and Zhou Miao have a lot of contact with local ancient building enthusiasts in Fujian. Compared with official statistics, they sometimes rely on these people material.

;

; "One problem now is that many local governments are actually unwilling to bear this risk, knowing that it is a valuable cultural relic, but it is not willing to report it. The situation exists. "Zheng Jinlan told the reporter from the southern weekend. As long as it is not reported as a cultural relic point, no one needs to be responsible after being damaged.

;

; Protecting as many ancient architectural samples as possible is the basis for scholars to conduct systematic research. What is the position of Fu Shantang in the Yuan Dynasty architecture? Zhou Miao, who specializes in the Song and Yuan architecture, is difficult to say, "because there are too few Yuan Dynasty architecture in the south."

;

; The Yuan Dynasty buildings in the north are relatively retained, and in specific areas, the number can be analyzed as much as possible. "In the north, it can be a level distinction of architecture in the Yuan Dynasty to comment on what different levels look like." Zhou Miao said. If Fushan Hall is placed in the northern yuan structure, then it is undoubtedly the level of low -level village Buddhist temples, but its hall is much larger than ordinary villages and temples. "After the Northern Yuan Dynasty The combination of the structure of low -level buildings began to become messy, mixed, or messy and not particular about it. But the regulation and order of Foshantang are still pretty good, which is unexpected. " /p>;

; The Hall of Foshan Hall has gone through the storm of history, and now it is facing the empty nest of the countryside. Before the 1950s, there were more than 500 households in the village. Nowadays, there are only less than 800 people left in Zhengwei Village, and the entire administrative village (including 6 natural villages in the surrounding are).

;

; Behind ancient buildings are not only discoverers and researchers, but also users who are closely related to them. After the logging industry disappeared, the village was in fact. The entire village costs about 200,000 yuan a year. The salary of the village committees and the village's sanitary expenses are sometimes difficult to guarantee. There are no young people in the village. After this generation of Tsing Yi Zhai's death, the daily maintenance and use of Fushantang is likely to lose activity.

;

; Liu Yan is also very interested in the rituals and costumes of Tsing Yi Zhai, as well as the village's drama class. "This village seems to have a kind of magic, which can retain so many ancient things." He plans to investigate and surveys and mapping again next year's winter vacation and summer vacation, and "soak" in the local area for a long time to do the field survey of real architecture anthropology. "It is more interesting to combine people and architecture." He also understands that if he does not record as soon as possible, the whole cultural system around Fu Shantang will disappear.

;

; Jian'er's "upgrade" movement of Fu Shantang is unfolding. Originally, Fushantang was just a general cultural protection point, and even the county insurance was not. Now it is promoted by "cross -level". You can do a promotion work. "Zheng Jinlan said. The provincial insurance is prepared for the future of the national security. "The southern wood structure of the Yuan Dynasty will definitely enter the national insurance." Liu Yan said.

;

; Qingyi Zhai's daily lesson will definitely be affected by the upgrading of cultural relics protection levels. Zheng Fawang intends to prepare a tripod for them outside the temple so that the fragrant candle will no longer enter the hall. After bidding farewell to Qingyi Zhai, Liu Yanhe did not continue to drive north to visit Yunfeng Temple in Mountain Mountain. For the time being, it is a national security building in the west and east.

;

;"Goodbye Lover" reached its third season, and producer Liu Le finally realized his dream when he proposed the plan - bringing guests with him Entered the Civil Affairs Bureau for a day of filming.

;

;The service hall of the Aheqi County Civil Affairs Bureau is less than 200 square meters, and marriages and divorces are completed here. Three pairs of guests who didn't know whether they would get divorced witnessed the union of several local couples and the separation of families.

;

;Liu Le used to be a social news reporter and worked in the Civil Affairs Bureau. After deciding to make "Goodbye Lover", she asked the team to squat in front of the Civil Affairs Bureau. Although it was fruitless, the members all faced the original shock. They couldn't say anything at the moment. After returning, everyone had ups and downs. "I want to shoot joys and sorrows all in the same place, and human feelings are not the same. When you made the promise, did you ever think about separation? When you separated, did you remember the promise?" Liu Le said.

;

;In 2021, the first season of the reality show "Goodbye Love", which is closely related to "divorce", will be launched. In the program, three pairs of guests who have problems in their marriages went on an 18-day trip to review the beauty of love, analyze marriage problems, and find answers to relationships. The program presents the trivial and difficult-to-discern life in public, and explores the details and deep conflicts of marriage, which resonates with the audience. In the autumn of 2023, the third season of "Goodbye Lover" will be broadcast. Fu Seoul and Lao Liu, Ji Huanbo and Wang Shiqing, Wang Sleepy and Zhang Shuosheng are three lovers who "look beautiful" to outsiders, exposing the illusion, facing their respective dilemmas, and once again Generate discussions about intimacy.

;

;Liu Le, the core producer and chief director of this show, has been a social news reporter for four years and the director of "Happy Camp" for ten years. In the past three years, in addition to the "Goodbye Lover" series, her His other works include "The Delayed Departure of Spring" - also related to divorce. She has been paying attention to emotional topics for a long time. She liked to post emotional jokes on the Internet from time to time many years ago. She has written most of the program copywriting for "Goodbye Lover" and "Spring Departs Again".

;

;"Goodbye Lover" is the summary of Liu Le's more than ten years of experience in the industry, which combines the touch and sensitivity of a traditional journalist, the entertainment and dexterity of a variety show director, and the sharpness and sharpness of an emotional blogger. As a single woman, she has pushed many married people to take a step forward in their exploration of marriage and intimacy.

;

;After the show was broadcast, Liu Le received more concern and support than expected. Some colleagues even wanted to get married after reading it. Hu Yanbin, a guest in the observation room, told her: "If parting is not so terrible, and we still have such deep care for each other, such good wishes, and such a decent separation, then I would also long for marriage."

;

;《 After the recording of the third season of "Goodbye Lover" ended, Liu Le accepted an exclusive interview with us and talked about the joys and sorrows related to the show in the past three seasons and the subtleties of human nature she has explored.

;

;Can't we get a divorce without quarreling?

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;"Goodbye Lover" reaches its third season and is still touching What's yours? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;What shocked me the most this season was the sense of blamelessness between Seoul and Lao Liu. Before coming to Seoul, tell me, is it okay if I don’t quarrel? I said that whoever said "Goodbye Lover" would quarrel, and if there is no quarrel, there will be no quarrel. ;

;

;When we went to the Civil Affairs Bureau, the director asked why we couldn’t survive. What happened? Are you not going home? Was it drinking? Did he hit you? He has a lot of "clinical experiment" experience, and the questions he raised are very valuable. When we hear about other people’s divorce in our daily lives, we also ask what questions there are. If he said that there was no problem, why would he divorce? Good days.

;

;The inertial thinking of many people is that I have to have an affair, have a violent family, and have to defraud me of money before I can get divorced. no. So our main concept this season is dull pain and slow growth. I can't tell you exactly what it is.

;

;When the first few episodes were aired, you may have thought that you were complaining for no reason, that you were forcing yourself to express your sorrow, and that you just made up a set of words just to be on the show. Like Seoul, in the first half and second half of the broadcast, I read some public accounts and wrote from the beginning that Fu Seoul must be here to make money, and she will definitely not get divorced. After a few episodes, another public account wrote that Fu Seoul must be here to make money, because she had already planned to leave.

;

;How people will recognize her is also the most difficult part to convince Seoul. Everyone will doubt whether she is motivated by utilitarianism. I told her, if you are willing to face your real dilemma, come. This sound will never dissipate. The most important point for persuading her is that she has real emotional demands. The marriage of more than ten years has truly taken root in her heart.

;

;I have known her for several years. When I was still in "Happy Camp", she came to be my guest. She said that I am particularly envious of your state, a state where you can fall in love at any time. I said, did you encounter any confusion in your marriage? Chatted with her a bit. After doing "Goodbye Lover", she often sent me some comments after watching the first two seasons. I felt that what she said actually brought her own personality.

;

;Seoul is very defensive. She will protect herself, but she wants to speak, but she won’t speak very thoroughly. She looks happy and cheerful, but there must be a lot of devastation in her heart buried under the surface of her wanting to make everyone happy, and I really want to dig this thing out. I mentioned it to her after the second season ended, and there must have been a process of persuasion. I told her that as long as you make up your mind, nothing will happen. The problem is a problem, but it can be solved.

;

;My judgment is that she will face it sooner or later. I am not saying that she must come on the show, but she has many knots in her heart that cannot be relieved by chatting with friends. On the one hand, she wants to seek change, and on the other hand, she also longs to be understood by more people. She still has the "old script" part to a large extent. I have been married for more than ten years and no one has made any mistakes. We have all tried our best. Why can't we live well? If so, can we choose to separate? I feel that she and Lao Liu are both in a trapped state. She can't really reconcile this matter, so much so that she is willing to go on a show to reveal everything to everyone. The real situation is like this, then I Can it be understood? She is so eager to be understood. She is pioneering and conservative, active and passive. She is a very charming contradiction.

;

;I hope that one day she can accept her real difficulties and not move forcefully towards another life. This may be easier, but Seoul is not an easy person.

;

;;

;

;In the third season of "Goodbye Lover", six guests celebrated the 14th wedding anniversary of Fu Seoul and Liu Yi;;

;

;Don’t separate easily, and don’t drag it out to death

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;How did you find the other two pairs of guests? ;

;

;;Liu Le:;;The other two pairs signed up by themselves. Wang Shiqing signed up for the second season, but when I talked to her at the time, there were no such big conflicts as this season. This year, I feel much more profound. After we reopened from the closed state last year, we entered a dynamic that will bring many severe impacts. If the relationship itself is good, this dynamic has the potential to make you even better. If it is not good in the first place, it will fall apart faster. ;

;

;Wang Shiqing has more job opportunities, and she obviously feels that she is stronger. Her connections and feedback from society have become extremely concrete. She really feels like "I am flying high." ". As for the person who wanted to hold me back, his actions became more obvious.

;

;Wang Sleeping signed up after the second season. At that time, the many quarrels between Zhang Wanting and Song Ningfeng reminded her of herself. She felt that she also liked to curse people and was unhappy, so she filled out the registration form. When I first looked at their materials, I didn’t see as many problems as those presented in the show. In the first round of contact, many directors judged them to be trivial and the problems were too trivial. They didn’t seem to be worth analyzing in daily life, not so thought-provoking, and not so promising. Expansion space, etc.

;

;Is it possible that trivial things are really worth extending? Could the program team be trapped by the so-called desire to pursue quality? Is it that when we present intimate relationships, we are too obsessed with those things that are invisible, intangible, and unclear, while those things that can be clearly seen, touched, grasped, and can be directly judged as right or wrong? Are we all excluded?

;

;Let's reflect on it. In the first season, Zhu Yaqiong expressed a lot of feelings, but in the end what people remember is that one-minute hug. Or implement it on specific events. Specific events can give people something to grasp, reflect on whether they have behaved like this, and better establish a comparative coordinate system, so we set them.

;

; Many people say that "Goodbye Lover" is to rely on fierce quarrels to attract attention. No, the show group does not want to be endless. That thing makes people despair and suffocate. But since it’s a reality show, we can’t interfere once they start. It is impossible for us to go up and tell them to stop quarreling and make peace with me quickly. It is even less possible for us to tell them that you two can start quarreling now. This is ridiculous. All we can do is record it truthfully.

;

;What topics will the flying guests bring when they join, and what new projects can they do? We can invisiblely implant these into the journey to trigger changes in them. The others exploded without even knowing what game they would be in, and any one sentence made him angry.

;

;Look, Zhang Shuo sent a WeChat message to the best man at that time ; (In the first issue, Wang Sleepy and Zhang Shuo had a dispute over their marriage. They had a quarrel, and the two broke up. Later, they quarreled over other things. At this time, Zhang Shuo sent a WeChat message to the best man to try to ease the conflict with Sui Suo. His most real feeling at that moment was that it was a good thing to do. , it can definitely be undone: She was angry with me because of other things, and I immediately had to do something to make up for it. But precisely because he did these things, the audience intuitively felt that his model was to tear down the east wall to repair the west wall, and the demolition was not good, and the repair was not good, and the whole person was very perfunctory. Is this perfunctory social norm? yes. So it resonated the most. A quarrel can only make people watch the fun, but what can make everyone stay after the fun is the pain behind the quarrel. It’s a point of empathy.

;

;I think Zhang Shuo still represents a very common phenomenon: I don’t need to achieve 100 points in this matter, I always control my efforts, just achieve 10 points, 20 points That's it, lay flat everywhere, whether it's work, socializing or love for him. Huang Zhizhong is right, he is very stingy with his energy. Now that I have paid 10 points of energy, if you don’t recognize the value of my 10 points, I will not be happy. Is this selfish? of course.

;

;Because of the hot search for "Mirror of Society" posted by Zhang Shuo, I think the audience can also very intuitively feel how powerless such an emotional model is for contemporary young people. Why do so many people not want to fall in love? Everyone said that I don't need to be so full, if love is not deeply loved.

;

;In fact, Zhang Shuo has many advantages. We are angry at him, but we cannot hate him. He is indeed a very kind-hearted child who is very considerate of the emotions around him. But why is this the pattern in intimate relationships? It’s been explored in the program, and it’s also being talked about in the observation room. (One of the reasons may be) People crave positive feedback, which is a physiological mechanism. If I make a mistake, do I want to get some advice instead of being asked if I am wrong? No one likes to be whipped all the time. After being whipped, I may do worse. This is a behavioral mechanism.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;There are many words "Sleep, sleep and run" in the program barrage. No one can understand why the two of them are still together. ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;I think the audience has directly seen a presentation, and they will think that since this is the case, why don't they break up? But as far as Suisie is concerned, this person is my first love. We have been together for 10 years. He used to be very good to me. It is not easy to decide to break up. When encountering problems, I must first think about how to solve them. What has changed? Can I change it? ;

;

;People must have hope, this is a very positive thing. Most people in the past went to the other extreme. No matter how hard, how tired, how many grievances we suffered, we had to live this life and never get divorced. Now the new trend is: if something is slightly wrong, say goodbye immediately.

;

;"Goodbye Lover" has always wanted to find a middle balance, neither to separate easily nor to drag it out to death. We hope to have the ability to leave and repair. Maybe this is a healthier love.

;

;I believe that for Wang Sleepy, when she decided to appear on the show, she just wanted to give the relationship one last chance. If it works out well, she will continue it, and if it doesn't, she will break up. In this process, every wavering, anger, and softening of her heart is extremely sincere. She is trying to re-recognize this person.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;After the program was broadcast, Zhang Shuo’s behavior caused a lot of controversy controversy. What was his feedback? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;He is in pain. I feel like my self has been completely shattered and completely denied. During the broadcast, he would come to discuss with us from time to time, basically introspection, which I found very difficult. No one can really quickly admit that they are a terrible person. This is a cruel thing and takes time, but we see that Zhang Shuo has been working hard. He still has an exploratory attitude. ;

;

;Zhang Shuo is considered a very sunny person in the show, and he is quite able to have fun for himself. Whether these public opinions are correct or not, they have a great impact on him. He was in pain, but he had to admit that some of the comments might be quite reasonable. Just like when a person wants to digest a knife, a knife is already in the flesh. It is cutting my tumor. I scream in pain, but I have to endure it.

;

;;

;

;"Goodbye Lover" Season 3 guests Wang Sleepy (left) and Zhang Shuo;;

; < p>; ; Southern Character Weekly: ; ; The strong men's weak comments on this season, this is your intention For that? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;It was not intentional. Usually we don’t save materials just because they have something in common. We discover that we can come up with something during the process of saving. The title of the first issue, "Looks Beautiful," is the commonality we picked out. The three couples were all collected separately. From the massive amount of material about each of them, we came up with the point that our marriage may look good to outsiders, but in fact it is not. ;

;

;As for whether women are strong and men are weak, I think we are just providing a discussion angle. Maybe everyone will come to this conclusion after reading it. In fact, none of these three couples are absolutely strong women, and they also have weaknesses. So we discussed what is strong, is it economic strength? If there is only one dimension, it can be considered that the three pairs are all strong women and weak men. But what about the right to speak? What about the need to be loved? What about the sense of presence in marriage? What about ease and comfort? Who is the emotional superior? Returning to these dimensions, they may not be strong.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;You just said that you hope this program will be a platform for exploration. This is The original intention of the show? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;I have this direction only by doing it. Every time we meet a couple and they come to our show, their behavior may be somewhat beyond the threshold: too manipulative, too insecure, too patient, etc. ;

;

;For all parts that exceed the threshold, we hope to make everyone realize that this is a bit beyond the limit and you can come back. We strive to stand in a safer area. But sometimes, when some problems occur, I hope that everyone will not think that this matter is such a big deal.

;

;Now NPD;(narcissistic personality disorder);, gaslighting;(a means of psychological manipulation);, borderline personality and other terms often appear. When people encounter something, they may immediately make a conclusion. So what are the real meanings of these words? What is the definition of professional? Will there be any overkill?

;

;I have also been thinking about this question since the second season. Can we conclude that this person is a lunatic once his behavior exceeds our daily cognition? Or once we make a judgment on a person, will everything he says next be untrustworthy? I don't think so. Teacher Guo ;(Guo Keyu); said in the first season: "People have too many sides." I particularly agree with this sentence. . There are all kinds of people, including crazy, depressed, high-value, and low-value people. People themselves are complex and imperfect animals, but their desire to be loved is true. Everyone is equal in love and everyone is equal in intimate relationships. This is why "Goodbye Lover" does not strictly distinguish between celebrities and amateurs. We put them all in one field for discussion.

;

;I read a review that said "Goodbye Lover" is like untying a Luban lock, making those that are not tight enough buckle tighter and letting those that are on the verge of falling apart fall to the ground smoothly, rather than violently dismantling or never untying them. Open, let’s find a final ending for all the shaky Luban Locks. I agree.

;

;No more shame when talking about intimate relationships

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;How did you come up with the idea of ​​doing such a show at that time? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;From an industry perspective, there was a vacancy in the divorce track. At that time, all major platforms were exploring divorce IP. In the existing domestic and foreign divorce IP, some problems have not been really solved. For example, what is the appeal? If you are divorced and you are put on a trip together, do you have any appeal? Or is this the appeal of a program? Is it a request to watch? If the character has no appeal, what is presented may be very empty and ungrounded. ;

;

;The divorce cooling-off period is the key to why I think of this IP. It can be used as an appeal. The first people I target are couples who have entered a cooling-off period. We only have 30 days to see if we can get this order. In marriage, everyone may have thought about divorce countless times. Why? What actions did you take after thinking about it? Repair it, or ignore it? ...There are a lot of character dynamics that can be told here, and because the divorce has not really been completed, we still have room to explore. The guests in the third season should be said to be the most suitable for my earliest plan, and they are not finished yet.

;

;The first two seasons are also based on this idea. The people we choose are not cold at least in our judgment. If they are cold, there will be no stories to tell. It is not good to divorce for too long, preferably within two or three years. The two people still have some contact from time to time, and some people have even proposed getting back together, etc. There are still ties, demands, and some confusions.

;

;In daily life, I see other people's affairs very clearly, but I can always put off my own affairs, and maybe they will get better again. Without a huge incident, it is not easy for people to start a knife in a relatively smooth and ups and downs. We are not aware of the deep-seated rifts. How can we have the strength to detect this? Who would take an X-ray to illuminate their emotions? Many people do it either out of fear, laziness or avoidance. That's almost enough. Why do you keep saying this? It's so pretentious. This is especially common among men in relationships. Is there anything to discuss? I'm going out for a drink. I have many colleagues and the company has many things going on.

;

;Communication and communication are often a matter of two people, not a unilateral choice. If I tell others, I want to talk to my lover about the problems in our eight-year marriage, but He doesn't talk to me properly, so if I want to divorce him, others may say you are sick. But in the context of "Goodbye Lover", no matter how small the issue is, it will be taken seriously, and everyone will discuss it. So how do you talk about this, and whether you should divorce your marriage.

;

;"Goodbye Lover" focuses on many issues in intimate relationships. I took a magnifying glass to this area, and everyone said that your issue seems to be really worthy of attention.

;

;This is at least a starting point for people who are stuck in marriage, people who want to get married, and people who want to talk about these things but are embarrassed. I am no longer ashamed, I want to talk to you today. Chat, let’s communicate your neglect of me. I don’t think it’s very abrupt, I don’t feel ashamed, it’s healthy, it’s also a kind of courage, and it’s also a kind of bravery.

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;Why do most of the travel destinations chosen have beautiful scenery, but Somewhere relatively off the beaten track? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;Choose these places because they look good. The original and natural beauty is very important. People should get in touch with nature when they are confused, but few people do this. The place we chose is because we hope to stay there for a long time, making it very difficult for them and allowing them to feel the vastness of the world and the insignificance of human beings. This is an intuitive psychological suggestion. ;

;

;Nature still has a strong healing effect. We strive to create a high-purity (shooting) environment so that they can safely enter deep water areas to discuss. This process is not easy, the beautiful scenery is a short-term comfort, no matter what, they are a very, very brave group of people.

;

;;

;

;"Goodbye Lover" Season 2;;

;

;Praise to love, praise romance

;

;;Southern People Weekly:;;You have no marriage experience, and the sweetness and pain of marriage in daily life are very small. And really, how do you grasp these subtleties in a divorce show? ;

;

;;Liu Le: ;;I have to understand why he did this at this moment. Why does he feel this way? Why make such a judgment? It’s certainly not 100% empathetic, but in this process, what are the questions worth asking? These can be developed through training, which is asking questions about intuition. ;

;

;I think it is a good thing that I have never been married. I have contacted some colleagues, and I heard that I was going to do this subject, and I especially wanted to chat with me. After talking with me, I felt that everyone was too focused on themselves, and it was easy to draw conclusions, "What is marriage?" With sentences like this, I I heard a lot during that time, and they were all very different. The only thing they had in common was that they all believed in their own judgment in marriage. At this time, I clear my mind. I don’t listen to anyone’s words. I only present the words of all of you as a sample. The sample can have many cores for the audience to summarize on their own.

;

;The official website of the State Administration of Taxation announced that on the morning of November 28, 2023, relevant responsible comrades from the Organization Department of the Central Committee attended the meeting of leading cadres of the State Administration of Taxation and announced the central government’s decision: Comrade Hu Jinglin will be appointed as the national Secretary of the Party Committee of the State Administration of Taxation, Comrade Wang Jun is removed from his position as Secretary of the Party Committee of the State Administration of Taxation.

;

;

;Served in the Ministry of Finance for 20 years

;

;According to the official website of the State Council Information Office, Hu Jinglin was born in 1964 in Shexian County, Anhui Province. He graduated from Renmin University of China and received a doctorate in economics.

;

;Since 1992, Hu Jinglin has worked in the State-owned Assets Administration Bureau as deputy director of the Policy, Regulations and Judicial Regulations Division. According to the "Historical Dictionary Series of the Communist Party of China", in order to straighten out the relationship between state-owned assets and establish and improve the state-owned assets management system in the process of reform and opening up, in November 1988, the state established the State-owned Assets Administration Bureau.

;

;According to information from the Chinese Government website, in 1994, the State-owned Assets Administration became a national bureau (deputy ministerial level) managed by the Ministry of Finance. Its main task is to comprehensively manage state-owned assets within and outside the People's Republic of China.

;

;In March 1998, the State-owned Assets Administration Bureau was officially abolished. In the same year, the Large Enterprise Working Committee of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China was formally established. ;

;At the time of the organizational reform in 1998, Hu Jinglin entered the Property Appraisal Department of the Ministry of Finance, and then served as Director of the Economic Construction Department of the Ministry of Finance, Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Finance, and Spokesperson of the Ministry of Finance.

;

; According to the official website of the State Council Information Office, Hu Jinglin has long been engaged in state-owned enterprise reform and macroeconomic theoretical research and practical work. ;In 2009, Hu Jinglin served as Assistant Minister of Finance and member of the Party Leadership Group. Five years later, he was promoted to deputy minister of finance.

;According to The Paper, when he was promoted to Vice Minister of Finance, Hu Jinglin was in charge of the General Office, Department of Agriculture, National Agricultural Comprehensive Development Office, Bureau of Retired Cadres, Information Network Center, and China Finance and Taxation Museum, assisting then Minister of Finance Lou Jiwei is in charge of the Office of the State Council’s Comprehensive Rural Reform Working Group.

;

;In 2015, Hu Jinglin emphasized at the National Financial, Administrative, Political and Legal Work Conference that as far as the budget is concerned, it is necessary to enhance the legality and binding force of the budget and how to solve the problems of inaccurate budget preparation at the beginning of the year and mid-year budget. To deal with the problems of frequent adjustments and excessive budget balances at the end of the year, "we need to work with departments to establish the concept of 'budget is law'."

A variety of anti-cancer drugs and drugs for rare diseases are included in medical insurance at appropriate prices, and after reimbursement, the cumulative burden on patients has been reduced by more than 500 billion yuan.

In addition, give full play to the power of the reporting reward system and establish a reporting clue supervision and feedback mechanism.

;"Make good use of the agreement management system. Medical institutions whose agreements have been terminated shall not be included in the medical insurance designated areas within 3 years. Build a long-term mechanism for fund supervision and ;;;Never let the medical insurance fund Become the new 'Tang Seng meat' ;. "Hu Jinglin introduced.

;At the above-mentioned press conference of the State Council Information Office, Hu Jinglin said that medical insurance funds are "life-saving money" for the people. The National Medical Insurance Administration has always regarded strengthening the supervision of medical insurance funds and maintaining fund security as its top priority, and severely cracked down on various forms of fraud. Such illegal use of medical insurance funds.

;"In the past five years, the total annual revenue of the basic medical insurance fund (including maternity insurance) has increased from 2.14 trillion yuan to 3.09 trillion yuan, and the total annual expenditure has increased from 1.78 trillion yuan to 2.46 trillion yuan. The fund is running smoothly and has a balance," Hu Jinglin said.

;

;Wang Jun has been the director of the State Administration of Taxation for ten years

;

;The Chinese government website shows that Wang Jun, the current director of the State Administration of Taxation, was born in 1958. He graduated from Peking University and received a doctorate in law.

;

;Wang Jun served in the Ministry of Finance from 1987 to 2013. In March 2013, Wang Jun, then deputy secretary of the Party Leadership Group and deputy minister of the Ministry of Finance, was promoted to secretary of the Party Leadership Group and director of the State Administration of Taxation.

;;

;In 2023, Wang Jun, Director of the State Administration of Taxation, and The head of Qatar’s General Tax Authority held talks. Image source: The official website of the State Administration of Taxation

;

;At the end of 1993, the State Council issued a document stating that in order to adapt to the national tax work, the organizational specifications of the State Administration of Taxation would be adjusted from the deputy ministerial level to the ministerial level. ;

;Since the reform of the tax-sharing system, the State Administration of Taxation has successively had five directors, namely Liu Zhongli, Jin Renqing, Xie Xuren, Xiao Jie, and Wang Jun. Among them, Wang Jun has served the longest.

;

;All five of them have worked in the Ministry of Finance, and four of them have served as Ministers of Finance.

;

;Liu Zhongli served as Minister of Finance and concurrently Director of the State Administration of Taxation from 1992 to 1998. Jin Renqing, Xie Xuren, and Xiao Jie all served as Ministers of Finance after serving as Directors of the State Administration of Taxation.
